newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's wholesale prices rise 0.01 pct in Feb.
newsitem.headline: Peru's wholesale prices rise 0.01 pct in Feb.

text.p: Peru's wholesale prices rose 0.01 percent in February, down from 1.4 percent in the same month last year and from 0.38 percent in January, the government said Saturday.
In the first two months of 1997, wholesale prices rose 0.39 percent, down from 2.5 percent in the same period last year, the National Institute of Statistics and Information (INEI) said.
In 1996, accumulated inflation for wholesale prices was 11.4 percent, up from 8.80 percent the previous year.
